data.title: Problem clearing Cubemaps
data.body:
![cubemap](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/11800663/7903001/2dc0aab2-0794-11e5-97fb-8a072b3dc077.jpg)
I think I found a bug... I can't clear a Cubemap from the WorldEvironment node once I have added it on my Linux OS. After you try to clear the Cubemap the editor starts messing up as well. Godot 1.1 stable

data.title: Arrays in sub-class not work!!!
data.body:
I have a subclass with arrays, and when it start the reference to arrays is missing!
In some cases I can use push_back but, out of functions arrays appears null or empty!
I using Godot 1.1 build with last code at 31/05
![captura de tela_2015-05-31_08-37-14](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/85936/7902182/857a3c18-0786-11e5-9196-b1b427c2f729.png)

data.title: Export Debug setting should be persistent across editor runs
data.body: I set debug off when I export.  If I exit the editor then come back in, the next time I export debug is back on.

data.title: new() subclass from script's subclass itself results in error
popup_menu.clear() does not reset selected menu
directory class doesn't seem to work in user://
data.body: I don't seem to be able to create a directory in user:// or detect file_exists() using directory (but File works for that) This code does not work: ``` export var local_data_dir = "user://SA_local_data" ... var dir = Directory.new() #if local_data_dir directory does not exist if (!dir.dir_exists(local_data_dir)): # create local_data_dir logger.info(logstr("Creating " + local_data_dir)) dir.make_dir(local_data_dir) if (!dir.file_exists(highScoreFile)): ... ``` (could be by design to prevent stuff like user://../../ )

data.title: File importer dialog does not see files added via the OS filesystem on real-time
data.body:
reproduce bug steps:

use Windows 8.1
download latest godot / run it as normal
download the project files ("pong assets") and unzip
create a project, as in  https://github.com/okamstudio/godot/wiki/tutorial_2d
(don't close godot)
go to Main menu -> Import -> 2d texture
add "pong assets" folder inside the new project's dir
See that the new folder doesn't appear in the /pong/ directory in the godot dialog.
put the individual image files into the /pong/ directory
See that the new files don't appear in the /pong/ directory in  the godot dialog.
go up a dir twice, in the godot file dialog.
navigate back to /godot/pong
See that the directory has been "refreshed" or "re-scanned" only now. This is the issue.

data.title: [Feature request] Ternary conditional ?:
data.body: I would love to see Ternary conditional ( ?: operator ) in both GDscript and shading language.

data.title: Fixed ui_accept problem
data.body: It's possible now to make a custom ui_accept action event and pull it.

data.title: "Invalid to set ' xxx ' ( on base "InputEvent" )
data.body:
It's impossible to set members of unioned classes in InputEvent ( like InputEventKey, InputEventMouse etc. ).

example:

```
var ev = InputEvent()
ev.type = InputEvent.KEY
ev.echo = false
```

gives:

```
"Invalid to set ' echo ' ( on base "InputEvent" )"
```

data.title: [Question] What is the RasterizerDummy used for?
data.body:
Does it do software rendering?
Can it be used on a platform without GLES2?

data.title: SamplePlayer2D on debug issue (1.1stable)
data.body:
When running a scene that contains a SamplePlayer2D node with audio samples loaded, the debug panel will show attributes of said samples.

It's annoying and it should not be printed at all.

This an example of the output when I load two audio files:

> > *\* Debug Process Started **
> > chunksize: 112328
> > channels: 2
> > bits: 16
> > len bytes: 112328 bufsize: 112328
> > chunksize: 123052
> > channels: 2
> > bits: 16
> > len bytes: 123052 bufsize: 123052
> > *\* Debug Process Stopped **

This happens in 1.1 stable. I tested it on a new project.
I'm using Linux Mint 17 with Pulseaudio (idk if it helps)

Example project: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/274954519/test.zip

data.title: Disabling "receive shadows" seems to have no effect.
data.body: I disabled "receive shadows" on various objects, including a TestCube, but it seems to have no effect at all.

data.title: Projector texture on lights showing no effect
data.body:
_Bugsquad edit:_ Originally seen in 1.1 stable

A texture can be specified as projector for a spotlight, however I can see no effect. I'm expecting the texture to be projected onto the objects. Or at least the light from the spotlight having the shape of the texture.

data.title: [PATCH] Blender collada exporter produces files unreadable by Assimp
data.body:
Hi,

I'm using your collada exporter, but the files weren't readable by the popular library Assimp. I've made some changes, and thought I should send them upstream.

https://github.com/TheJosh/chaotic-rage/commit/fdc9962daee33b98f7847041f00f0c497795db15

Cheers,
Josh

data.title: mouse pos tracking in scaled viewports is not correct
data.body:
Windows 7 64 bit, 1.1 stable

I chased this down as a problem with moving a WindowDialog by dragging on the title bar but I think it is actually a mouse position reporting issue.  To reproduce:
1. New project setup as:
   ![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4614207/7850383/9b212c86-04af-11e5-8824-2784d084bc22.png)
2. Add a WindowDialog node
3. Run
4. Click and hold on the dialog title bar and slowly move the mouse - the dialog drags in sync with mouse
5. Resize the application window (make it substantially bigger or maximize it)
6. Click and hold on the dialog title bar and slowly move the mouse - the dialog does not move unless the mouse is moved quickly

I suspect the issue is in mouse movement event handling with scaled viewports - printing ev.relative_pos from _input_event on the WindowDialog node shows it as (0,0) unless the mouse is moved quickly.

data.title: The first scritpting tuto dont work
data.body:
Hello,

Im a mobile developper and i have followed the steps on this [link](https://github.com/okamstudio/godot/wiki/tutorial_scripting) but its dont work, the debbuger show :

```
Attempt to call function 'connect' in base 'null instance' on a null instance.
```

Is the tuto outdated ? I use Godot 1.1 and i have tried in Linux and Windows, same issue.

data.title: DualShock 4 malfunctional
data.body:
I tested a DualShock 4 with Linux Mint 17.1

It responds, but it does not map the buttons correctly, particularly the face buttons on the right side of the controller. It has two additional buttons not listed being the Home or System button between the analogue sticks & the touchpad press above it, which make it a larger button map. Due to this the button numbers don't go high enough to access the Dpad.

Here is my attempt to remap:
![remapping](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/12471157/7846542/6594d236-047b-11e5-8c32-183b8eb3d8ec.png)
.

data.title: INSTALL_FAILED_CONTAINER_ERROR when installing exported apk
data.body: I exported apk and got this message INSTALL_FAILED_CONTAINER_ERROR

data.title: Quat * Vec3 and Quat * Quat operators not implemented
data.body:
Multiplication of Quat with a Quat or with a Vec3 are currently impossible due to missing operators.

As far as I remember they aren't commutative tho but should work in both sense.

data.title: On Intel Haswell IGPs on Windows 8, materials with normal maps appear overly dark (3D)
data.body:
This is reproducible with this demo: https://github.com/Calinou/fps-test

This happens in both editor and game.

Note how the pillars are overly dark, but the grass isn't (it has no normal map in use).

data.title: [Change Request] Scene should be text file instead of binary
data.body: Git is most popular version control system now days. Git most least weakness is that its not support binary file quite well. Therefore, files which are update often should not be binary files even that there are not big. So .scn files should be text files

data.title: ERROR: set_stream_peer: Condition ' p_peer.is_null() ' is true.
data.body:
when move kinematicbody 
crash
and return this error

CLOSING CONNECTION
ERROR: set_stream_peer: Condition ' p_peer.is_null() ' is true.
   At: core/io/packet_peer.cpp:228.

This problem occurs with the ' latest version compiled by git .
with the previous version did not occur

data.title: setget is exceeded
data.body:
``` GDScript
var my_var = 1 setget set_my_var
func set_my_var(value):
        print(my_var) # 0 (should be 1)
    if value > 0:
        my_var = value
```

``` GDScript
var t = Test.new()
print(t.my_var) # 1
t.my_var = 0
```

The tutorial says "The setter must, then, decide what to do with the new value", but if i don't want of this value ?

data.title: Limit directional shadow draw distance, fixes #559, optimization
data.body: Shadow fade exponent is hardcoded for now. Someone with better understanding of Godot code could make it a parameter.

data.title: Bake with no meshes and crash
data.body:
upd: ops... wrong usage. but crash is not good :) if it have child meshes it is work fine

Pressing Bake! button of BakedLightInstance and got crashed

![error](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/11596541/7814522/57f3f8a6-03cb-11e5-9830-d3e27b395e1e.PNG)

"Program is not working"

data.title: OpenAL implementation for HTML5 sound
data.body:
Code is messy at this point, this is a very basic implementation, just trying things out.. 
Sound works but crackle
Here is an export of platformer-2d demo: http://www.parleboo.com/tests/platformer_js/ (no optimizations)
Tested on Firefox 38 @ Arch Linux 

reduz suggested to write a custom AudioServer for javascript export to avoid performance issues

I'd like to continue trying to make sound work with current AudioServer, I prefer low performance with sound than no sound at all for now.. maybe it will be ok for short games

data.title: 2D Platformer bug on Android
data.body: I deployed the bundled 2D platformer demo an Android (4.4.2) phone. Everything went smoothly until I attempted to jump through a ledge to get to the rest of the map. After jumping through the ledge, the screen went all funny and the game was no longer playable. The demo plays perfectly on Linux, so it's probably a platform specific thing. Let me know if you need anymore information to hunt this bug down.

data.title: Set ONESHOT connections from the Node Connections dialog
data.body: I think right now it can only be done from script.  You can set deferred, but not oneshot in the Confirm dialog.
